title: White House Reaction to Circuit Court Ruling
subject: White House Press Secretary Ari Fleischer Wednesday said, "The President was informed at the G-8 Summit about the San Francisco court decision pertaining to the flag. The President's reaction was that this ruling is ridiculous."
filename: White House Reaction to Circuit Court Ruling.mht
